titleStmt.title: A letter of a baker of Boulougne, sent to the pope. Translated out of the Italian copy (printed at Florence) into French and Dutch and now into English..

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Ferebrand, and are to bee solde at his Shop in the Popes-head Pallace neere the Royall Exchange.,

notesStmt.note: Head-pieces, initial; printers' device on t.p. (McK. 270?).
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his Shop in the Popes-head Pallace neere the Royall Exchange.
